# Compiler TSX

A custom compiler to convert Vue template to a (functional) TSX  representation for type checking.

## Usage

```
npm add @vuedx/compiler-tsx
```
<!-- #region API-DOCS -->
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is a report generated by [scripts/docgen.js](https://github.com/znck/vue-developer-experience/tree/main/scripts/docgen.js). -->

## Types


<a href="#-vuedx-compiler-tsx-CodegenResult-interface" id="-vuedx-compiler-tsx-CodegenResult-interface"></a>

### [CodegenResult](#-vuedx-compiler-tsx-CodegenResult-interface)



```ts
interface CodegenResult extends CodegenResult$1 {
  errors: CompilerError[];
  expressions: Array<[number, number]>;
  mappings: Array<[number, number, number, number, number]>;
}
```


<br>

<a href="#-vuedx-compiler-tsx-ComponentImport-interface" id="-vuedx-compiler-tsx-ComponentImport-interface"></a>

### [ComponentImport](#-vuedx-compiler-tsx-ComponentImport-interface)



```ts
interface ComponentImport {
  name?: string;
  named?: boolean;
  path: string;
}
```


<br>

<a href="#-vuedx-compiler-tsx-Options-interface" id="-vuedx-compiler-tsx-Options-interface"></a>

### [Options](#-vuedx-compiler-tsx-Options-interface)



```ts
interface Options {
  components?: Record<string, ComponentImport>;
  filename: string;
}
```
